thread.title: Lamar Odom suffered from multiple strokes
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom suffered from multiple strokes

author: Brian Yalung
title: Lamar Odom suffered from multiple strokes
text:
Oct. 15 Featured , NBA no comments 
Lamar Odom continues to be in critical condition after being found unconscious at the Love Ranch in Crystal, Nevada. 
The latest report from TMZ on the former NBA player’s condition reveals that Odom suffered from multiple strokes leading to the medical emergency. 
Such was revealed after an MRI was done on the former NBA player and TV personality after being admitted at the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas. It also remains to be known if brain damage resulted from the strokes. 
According to a report from the Guardian, Odom is still in a coma and on a respirator. He is also reportedly having problems with his kidneys and lungs. He is currently on 3-5 hour dialysis for kidney failure. 
Kobe Bryant, who was in town at the time of the incident rushed to the side of his former teammate and friend. Bryant was in town with the Los Angeles Lakers for a preseason game against the Sacramento Kings but left the MGM Arena early without talking to reporters.
